metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4008 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The _asn1_extract_der_octet function in lib/decoding.c in GNU Libtasn1before 4.8, when used without the ASN1_DECODE_FLAG_STRICT_DER flag, allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion) via acrafted certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4008` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-3-bin - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
libtasn1-6 - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
libtasn1-bin - 4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.7-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
